title: Sunday Comics: Why Are We Naked?
text:
Hello! It’s time for Kotaku’s Sunday Comics, your weekly roundup of the best webcomics. The images enlarge if you click on the magnifying glass icon.

Awkward Zombie by Katie Tiedrich. Published September 16. Read more of Awkward Zombie.

Corpse Run by Alex Di Stasi. Published September 16. Read more of Corpse Run.

Clueless Hero by Luis Lee and Ana Gaby Perez. Published September 16. Read more of Clueless Hero.

Double XP by M.S. Corley and Josh Crandall. Published September 20. Read more of Double XP.

Life in Aggro by Fei Hsiao and Cecilia Vasquez. Published September 22. Read more of Life in Aggro.

Nerf NOW!! by Josué Pereira. Published September 21. Read more of Nerf NOW!!

Penny Arcade by Jerry Holkins and Mike Krahulik. Published September 20. Read more of Penny Arcade.
description: Hello! It’s time for Kotaku’s Sunday Comics, your weekly roundup of the best webcomics. The images enlarge if you click on the magnifying glass icon.
